basics.name: Ishita Raj
basics.label: Undergraduate Researcher
basics.summary: Passionate about advancing NLP to create AI systems that are intuitive, relatable, and human-centric. I specialize in developing innovative solutions to enhance machine understanding and interaction, bridging the gap between technology and natural communication.

location.address: BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus, Shamirpet, Hyderabad, Telangana

experience.name: Bhaskaracharya National Institute for Space Applications and Geo-informatics
experience.summary: Developed and implemented data visualization techniques for multi-altitude weather data using box plots, histograms, and heatmaps to enhance analysis accuracy.

research.name: Machine Translation of Low Resource Languages
research.summary: Creating a fine-tuned model for translation between Hindi and Mundari (a low resource language) and enhancing it using contrastive learning
